hotel-description: located in the heart of the city, with a view of the sea and the mountains, the Luxuria Hotel is the perfect place for your vacation. The hotel has a swimming pool, a spa, a restaurant and a bar. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, with a balcony and a view of the sea or the mountains.
